text: Hamono ʙa Muso kitoʙi [Tavrot] dodem va pas az u pajomʙaroni pajdarpaj firistodem; va ʙa Iso pisari Marjam mu'cizotu daloili ravsan dodem va uro ʙa vasilai Ruhulqudus [Caʙrail] taqvijat kardem. Ojo cunin nest, ki har goh pajomʙare cize ʙarxilofi havoi nafsaton ovarad, dar ʙaroʙaras takaʙʙur namuded va guruhero takziʙ karded va guruhero kusted
